title: Kenai Fjords National Park: NEPA Documents
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning     NEPA Documents              NEPA Documents       The National Environmental Policy Act, among other actions, sets out procedural requirements for all federal government agencies to prepare environmental assessments (EA) and environmental impact statements (EIS). EA and EIS contain statements of the environmental effects of proposed federal agency actions.   Kenai Fjords will publish NEPA documents as they are finalized.       Current Environmental Assessments (EA) Herman Leirer Road Multi-Modal Trail Feasibility Study Environmental Assessment (2013)      Current Environmental Impact Statements (EIS) Finding of No Significant Impact (FONSI) for Herman Leirer Multi-Modal Trail Feasibility Study (2013)
